summary: Completed backend API testing for ERIC Search functionality. All 26 tests passed (100% success rate). Identified 2 minor bugs in search logic that don't break functionality but should be addressed.

minor.issue: When search_type='services', organizations are also returned. Line 667 in eric_agent.py includes 'services' in the condition for searching organizations.
minor.fix: Change line 667 from 'if search_type in ["all", "organizations", "services"]:' to 'if search_type in ["all", "organizations"]:'

minor.issue: Limit parameter is applied per collection, not to total results. Searching with limit=3 can return more than 3 results if matches exist in multiple collections.
minor.fix: Apply limit to final aggregated results instead of per-collection queries

action_items: LOW: Fix search_type='services' to not include organizations (eric_agent.py line 667)
LOW: Apply limit to total results instead of per-collection in search_platform method
critical_code_review_comments: eric_agent.py line 667: Bug - 'services' should not be in the condition for searching organizations
search_platform method: Limit is applied per collection query, not to final aggregated results
context_for_next_testing_agent: ERIC Search API tests are comprehensive. All endpoints working: /api/agent/search, /api/agent/chat-with-search, /api/work/organizations/{org_id}/eric-settings (GET/PUT). Russian keyword expansion (красота->beauty, ремонт->repair, машина->auto) is working. Two minor bugs identified but don't break core functionality.
